data.name: Agents of Mayhem - Carnage a Trois Skins Pack
data.detailed_description:
Time for total carnage! Daisy gets nostalgic for her derby days. Braddock signs up with the Colonial Marines. Yeti looks back to when he had hair… and his body temperature was above 0°C. Collect ‘em all!

  • 3 Geo skins
  • Daisy Geo-Skin
  • Braddock Geo-Skin
  • Yeti Geo-Skin
data.about_the_game:
Time for total carnage! Daisy gets nostalgic for her derby days. Braddock signs up with the Colonial Marines. Yeti looks back to when he had hair… and his body temperature was above 0°C. Collect ‘em all!

  • 3 Geo skins

  • Yeti Geo-Skin
data.short_description: Time for total carnage! Daisy gets nostalgic for her derby days. Braddock signs up with the Colonial Marines. Yeti looks back to when he had hair… and his body temperature was above 0°C. Collect ‘em all!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 8192 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 GB 利用可能
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 12288 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 GB 利用可能
